"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544145bf6368726d38550100#post_544145bf6368726d38550100
Funny, cause in Ukrainian, it's some sort of Easter cake. Strangely enough, Finns traditionally eat a pudding that looks suggestively like _paska_ during Easter.

topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544155956368721d5ebc0200#post_544155956368721d5ebc0200

since i tend to do pro jobs or loud heists more (rats, firestarter, hotline miame) cause they give far more XP compared to other heist, and a mistake in a pro job stays forever i always go back to loud guns.

but i got 2 or 3 weapons for silent heists once in a while since i cant say i hate them

!http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/30723057243124368/43118C6AFB47A038A736F8C5D650DDEE52B156C8/1024x575.resizedimage!
